data.title: 5 Reasons Why Bali Becomes One of the Best Islands in the World
data.meta_description: Plan your Bali adventure with our convenient online booking platform. Get insider tips and book the best activities for your trip
data.text:
Bali was once again named one of the best islands on Earth. Through a survey conducted by a traveling magazine from the United States, Travel + Leisure, the Island of the Gods became the third best island in the world in 2019.

With a score of 90.6, Bali is under Sri Lanka, known for its panoramic tourism and Palawan Island, Philippines. Meanwhile, Bali successfully defeated Milos Island in Greece and the Maldives about its natural beauty and culture. This post special

There are several reasons why Bali has been named as one of the 15 best islands in the world in 2019. Well, baliventur has summarized it for you, here! Who knows, really interested in a vacation to the Island of the Gods in the near future.

Listen, letâ€™s go!

This 5 Reasons Why Bali Becomes One of the Best Islands in the World

1. PUBLIC HOSPITALITY

One of the requirements to be the best island in the world is human resources or the community. And the world also knows Bali as a very friendly community. With traditional clothes that are polite and seem elegant, Balinese people also have a smooth speech. Thus, the atmosphere of peace and quiet builds itself on the Island of the Gods.

2. COMPLETE TOUR DESTINATIONS

Bali is widely known to have beautiful and authentic natural panorama. Not only the coastal areas such as Kuta or Lovina Beach, but also highland areas like Tampaksiring where there is a presidential palace. With this fact, many tourists who come not only for vacation with family, but also honeymooners with a partner. So, do not be surprised if Bali is called a very complete tourist destination!

3. DELICIOUS CULINARY VARIATIONS

One of the requirements to be the best island is its culture and cuisine. Well, a matter of culinary, Bali does not need to doubt. Many travelers from outside Bali are willing to come to Bali just to hunt for food. A variety of traditional dishes to fushion are served on the Island of the Gods such as chicken betutu, mixed rice, satay wrapped to the most delicious tepeng rice

4. CULTURATION OF CROSS-CULTURAL ARTS

5 Reasons Why Bali Becomes One of the Best Islands in the World. Compared to other islands in the world, Bali is present with a blend of cross-cultural art. Buildings with Hindu and Buddhist-style architecture will be easily found along the Island of the Gods. One of them is in Ubud, the Puri Lukisan Museum which can be the choice of tourists. With the status of the oldest museum in Bali, you can see works of Balinese painting both traditional and modern, as well as carving, and wood which consists of three eras, from the time of the Balinese kingdom to the period of Indonesian independence. So, you not only enjoy the natural vacation, but also the cultural uniqueness

5. TOURIST ATTRACTIONS TESTING THE EYES

In addition to being present with panoramic views of nature and delicious cuisine, Bali also offers many tourist attractions. The world also knows the uniqueness of the Kecak Dance from the Island of the Gods. Often performed on Jalan Pura Dalem, Ubud, you can enjoy dance performances that tell the life of the Ramayana. In fact, Kecak Dance was present in the film Eat, Pray and Love, starring Julia Roberts. Besides Kecak Dance, you will also be spoiled with unique actions from Barong Dance to Legong Dance.

Hope you enjoy the post 5 Reasons Why Bali Becomes One of the Best Islands in the World
